sku_minquantity_help.message: Minimum quantity of this product that can be ordered.

sku_maxquantity_help.message: Maximum quantity of this product that can be ordered.

sku_unlimitedinventory_help.message: When this option is enabled, the product will still be considered in stock

sku_allowbackorders_help.message: When this option is enabled, the product can be ordered even when it is out, anticipation of a future replenishment.

sku_allowquantitysplit_help.message: When this option is enabled, the order lines corresponding to this SKU can be delivered in several packages.

sku_virtual_help.message: Has no physical properties, and requires no delivery.
